channel.title: Artificial Intelligence on UN-aligned
channel.description: Recent content in Artificial Intelligence on UN-aligned

item.title: More Than a Mere Copycat? The Rise of AI-Generated Art and its Implications
item.author: Dinojah.Patkunarajah
item.description: Can AI art really be considered true art? The debate is heating up as many see this new technology as a mere copycat, while others argue that it has the potential to elevate human creativity to new heights.
